title: Enable MEV Frontrunning protection
summary:
The [v16 upgrade](https://github.com/CosmosContracts/juno/releases/tag/v16.0.0) introduced Skip's Builder Module (x/POB). In the upgrade, we set frontrunning protection to disabled.
This proposal enables frontrunning protection as was intended from the original upgrade plan.
(Credit to Yieldmos and Signal for the discovery)
